text: “‘Hagalabagauina do damana mo do dinana, gii hai be agu helekai ala e hai ko Au go Dimaadua go doo God adu gi goodou, gi humalia adu gi goodou i nia mee huogodoo, ge gi mouli goodou waalooloo i hongo dagu henua dela ga gowadu ko Au gi goodou.5.16 Deuteronomy 27.16; Matthew 15.4; 19.19; Mark 7.10; 10.19; Luke 18.20; Ephesians 6.2,3
